entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Otherwise sunny. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:07 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:07 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
